episode_event_general_sinnoh_battle01/67:
Thanks for helping me with my research,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I wasn’t exactly sure what about these replica
ruins here on Pasio caught Giratina’s attention...

But thanks to you, I think I’m starting to understand
it a bit.
Look what I’ve found! It’s the Champion of Sinnoh!
Hand over all your Pokémon! For free, naturally.
Hm? Oh, you must be members of Team Galactic.

You really think we’ll just comply with that
nonsense you’re spewing?

What are you trying to accomplish? I won’t allow
you to do anything bad around here.
Oh, Champion... Must you be so difficult?

If you just listen to us, we’ll refrain from causing
massive damage to your assistant.

But they don’t seem to care, no matter what
we say.

Sorry, but could you help me out a bit
longer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Let’s make them understand us with a battle!
We’ll teach them a lesson.

We will take everything that can be taken and
eliminate everything that is not needed! That is
Team Galactic’s policy!

Everything we do is for Master Cyrus! We’ll make
use of all your Pokémon!
episode_event_general_sinnoh_battle01/68:
I have to do something
about this.

Have you seen people in strange outfits recently?
Something that looks a bit out of this world?

I may need your help. If you don’t mind, please
lend me your strength when the time comes.
